00001 // ORBasicTreeWriter.cc
00002 
00003 #include "ORBasicTreeWriter.hh"
00004 #include "ORLogger.hh"
00005 
00006 using namespace std;
00007 
00008 ORBasicTreeWriter::ORBasicTreeWriter(ORVBasicTreeDecoder* decoder, string treeName, string branchPrefix) :
00009 ORVTreeWriter(decoder, treeName)
00010 {
00011   fBasicTreeDecoder = decoder;
00012   fBranchPrefix = branchPrefix;
00013   // ORBasicTreeWriters don't leave the filling of the tree to
00014   // ORVTreeWriter. For example, when a record has multiple rows to
00015   // write to a tree, each one must be written in sequence during
00016   // ProcessMyDataRecord().  For this reason, ORBasicTreeWriters write
00017   // to a unique tree and consist use a single decoder. If you require
00018   // a more complex tree filling, then you need something more than a
00019   // "basic" tree.
00020   SetDoNotAutoFillTree();
00021 }
00022 
00023 ORBasicTreeWriter::~ORBasicTreeWriter()
00024 {
00025   for (unsigned i=0; i<fParameters.size(); i++) delete fParameters[i];
00026 }
00027 
00028 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORBasicTreeWriter::InitializeBranches()
00029 {
00030   ORLog(kTrace) << "Initializing branches..." << endl;
00031   for (size_t iPar=0; iPar<fBasicTreeDecoder->GetNPars(); iPar++) {
00032     fParameters.push_back(new UInt_t);
00033     fTree->Branch(
00034       (fBranchPrefix + fBasicTreeDecoder->GetParName(iPar)).c_str(),
00035       fParameters[iPar], 
00036       (fBranchPrefix + fBasicTreeDecoder->GetParName(iPar)+"/i").c_str()
00037     );
00038   }
00039   ORLog(kTrace) << "Initialized " << fBasicTreeDecoder->GetNPars() << " branches." << endl;
00040   return kSuccess;
00041 }
00042 
00043 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORBasicTreeWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00044 {
00045   for (size_t iRow=0; iRow<fBasicTreeDecoder->GetNRows(record); iRow++) {
00046     for (size_t iPar=0; iPar<fBasicTreeDecoder->GetNPars(); iPar++) {
00047       *(fParameters[iPar]) = fBasicTreeDecoder->GetPar(record, iPar, iRow);
00048       if(ORLogger::GetSeverity() <= ORLogger::kDebug) {
00049         ORLog(kDebug) << fBranchPrefix+fBasicTreeDecoder->GetParName(iPar) << ": " 
00050                       << *(fParameters[iPar]) << endl;
00051       }
00052     }
00053     fTree->Fill();
00054   }
00055   return kSuccess;
00056 }
00057 
00058 void ORBasicTreeWriter::Clear()
00059 {
00060   ORLog(kWarning) << "You should never have to use ORBasicTreeWriter::Clear(), "
00061                   << "since ORBasicTreeWriter writes to a unique tree" << endl;
00062   for (size_t iPar=0; iPar<fBasicTreeDecoder->GetNPars(); iPar++) {
00063     (*(fParameters[iPar])) = 0;
00064   }
00065 }
